item.title: Charity Week success - £70,000 raised for orphans!
item.author: Hazem El-Turk,Harun Khan,
item.description: Last Saturday, fundraising totals were announced for Charity Week 2013 (CW) at the annual round-off dinner, with Imperial College students raising just under a staggering £70,000 in one week. In October, Imperial College was graced with the arrival of Charity Week; a national, student-led initiative …
